input:
Here is an example patient note:
Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan who comes to clinic with some general and non-specific bones and joints pain. She is married and has 3 children. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable. Her BMI is 23, BP: 120/75, HR: 75/min. Her laboratory study is remarkable for Vit D: 14ng/ml and otherwise healthy. (Ca: 9.2mg/dl, Phosphorus: 3.2mg/dl, PTH: 28pg/ml)

Here is an example clinical trial: Title: Energy Specific Far Infrared Radiation Treatment for Hyperparathyroidism

Summary:
A study to determine the possibility of using far infrared radiation to treat Hyperparathyroidism.
Intervention Type: Radiation
Inclusion Criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Persons with parathyroid disease 
Gender: All
Minimum age: N/A
Maximum age: N/A
Healthy volunteers: No
Exclusion Criteria: - None

Here is an example of the plain JSON output without intend: {'The woman described by the patient description is healthy and has no parathyroid disease.' : 'no relevant information'}

Here is an example patient note:
A Pap smear in a 54-year-old woman revealed abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion. She tested positive for HPV 16. She is sexually active with her husband and has 4 children. She is menopausal and uses no contraception. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently. She is otherwise healthy. She was offered conization.

Here is an example clinical trial:
Here is the clinical trial
Title: HPV Screening (Human Papilloma Virus)

Summary:
Examination of cervical &urine samples for HPV

Inclusion Criteria: Sampling method: Probability Sample
Inclusion Criteria: - all females attending colposcopy kasrelaini unit aging 18_45 years 
Gender: Female
Minimum age: 18 Years
Maximum age: 45 Years
Healthy volunteers: No

Exclusion Criteria: - females with known cervical cancer - females less than 18 or more than 45

Here is an example of the plain JSON output without intend: {'The woman described is 54 years old, which is violating tha maximum age of 45 for inclusion.' : 'not eligible'}

Here is an example patient note:
The patient is a 37-year-old woman who came to the clinic for a routine Pap smear. The test revealed stage 1B of cervical cancer. The patient tested positive for HPV 16. She has three sexual partners and four children. She underwent tubal ligation. She smokes 30 packs/year and drinks alcohol frequently. She is otherwise healthy. She was offered a radical hysterectomy.

Here is an example clinical trial:
Institut Paoli Calmettes Cervical Cancer Database

Summary:
Database of Institut Paoli-Calmettes patients diagnosed with cervical cancer

Intervention Type: Other

Inclusion Criteria: Sampling method: Non-Probability Sample
Inclusion Criteria: - Patient with a diagnosis of cervical cancer 
Gender: Female
Minimum age: 18 Years
Maximum age: 95 Years
Healthy volunteers: No

Exclusion Criteria: - Non applicable

Here is an example of the plain JSON output without intend: {'The given patient is matching all inclusion criteria. She is 37 years old and was diagnoses with cervical cancer.': 'eligible'}

Here is an example patient note:
A Pap smear in a 54-year-old woman revealed abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion. She tested positive for HPV 16. She is sexually active with her husband and has 4 children. She is menopausal and uses no contraception. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently. She is otherwise healthy. She was offered conization.

Here is an example clinical trial:
Here is the clinical trial
Title: Impact of Treatment Induced Premature Menopause on Quality of Life

Summary:
To understand the impact of treatment induced menopause on quality of life and sexuality following blood and marrow transplantation.

Inclusion Criteria: Sampling method: Non-Probability Sample
Inclusion Criteria: - premenopausal - sexually active women - able to read and write English 
Gender: Female
Minimum age: 18 Years
Maximum age: N/A
Healthy volunteers: No

Exclusion Criteria: - postmenopausal females 

Here is an example of the plain JSON output without intend: {'Described patient is menopausal and not premenopausal as required.' : 'no relevant information'}

Here is an example patient note:
A 15-week-old infant brought to the clinic for the follow up. The infant has flat facies, small ears, a single palmar crease, and upward slanting eyes. He was born on 39th week to a 39-year-old woman who didn't have prenatal care. The medical record confirms the trisomy of chromosome 21 (Down syndrome). The infant is otherwise healthy.

Here is an example clinical trial:
Title: Breast Tissue Before And After Breastfeeding Or The Use Of A Breast Pump

Summary:
There will be breast tissue changes after use of a breast pump.

Inclusion Criteria: Sampling method: Non-Probability Sample
Inclusion Criteria: - Lactating women who were breastfeeding. 
Gender: Female
Minimum age: 18 Years
Maximum age: 45 Years
Healthy volunteers: Accepts Healthy Volunteers

Exclusion Criteria: - Non breastfeeding or non lactating women. 

Here is an example of the plain JSON output without intend: {'The patient note is about an 15-weeks old infant and not a lactating woman.' : 'no relevant information'}
